name: Andy Wolff
bio: A ruggedly handsome and dashing archeologist in his early twenties. Andy became disillusioned with the constant threat of adventure and derring do. He humbly put away his whip on a whim while visiting a squalid and abandoned border town. He wandered aimlessly for a time, with a short stint in a secret society of assassins. But the less said of that the better. After avenging the death of his family he found a home, amongst a room of nerds.

name: Paul Katchmark
bio: As a young child, Paul witnesses his parents murder as they were walking home from the Monarch Theatre.  He swore an oath to rid the cith of the evil that had taken his parents lives.  Now he dresses in tights and fights crime at night.

name: Zach Garman
bio: Zach was sent back in time to stop an artificial intelligence system that will spark a nuclear holocaust in the near future. He is currently being hunted by a cyborg assassin disguised as a human.
